A

addReview(Moviegoer, MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.ReviewManager
Adds a review to a cinema movie.

B

BookingManager - Class in Controller
BookingManager is a control class which handles bookings by the user.
BookingManager() - Constructor for class Controller.BookingManager
 

C

ChangePriceAdjustment(TicketPrice) - Static method in class Controller.SystemManager
Allows user to change base price and price adjustment
Controller - package Controller
 
createMovieListing(MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.MovieListingManager
Adds a new cinema movie to the Movie Listing.
CreatePublicHoliday(PublicHolidayList) - Static method in class Controller.SystemManager
Creates public holiday
createShowTime(CineplexList, MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.ShowTimeManager
Adds a new Show Time to a Cinema Movie.

D

displayMovieDetails(MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.MovieDisplayManager
Displays additional information of a particular cinema movie.
displayMovieList(MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.MovieDisplayManager
Displays the list of all available cinema movies.
displayTop5List(Top5List) - Static method in class Controller.MovieDisplayManager
Displays the list of top 5 ranking cinema movies.Top 5 movies are displayed in descending order Top 5 movies can be ranked by overall reviewer rating or overall ticket sales.

M

makeBooking(CineplexList, MovieList, BookingList, PublicHolidayList, Moviegoer, TicketPrice) - Static method in class Controller.BookingManager
Registers a new transaction made by a user.
MovieDisplayManager - Class in Controller
Contains static methods to display Movie Listings for movie-goers.
MovieDisplayManager() - Constructor for class Controller.MovieDisplayManager
 
MovieListingManager - Class in Controller
Contains static methods for admin to add/edit/remove a cinema movie from the Movie Listing.
MovieListingManager() - Constructor for class Controller.MovieListingManager
 

P

priceCalculator(Cinema, CinemaMovie, GregorianCalendar, PublicHolidayList, TicketPrice, int) - Static method in class Controller.BookingManager
Calculates the price of a ticket based on Cinema type, Movie type, Seat type, day of the week and age of user.
printBooking(Booking) - Static method in class Controller.BookingManager
Prints the booking receipt of the transaction.
printBookingHist(BookingList, Moviegoer) - Static method in class Controller.BookingManager
Prints all the receipts of the Bookings in a specified booking list for a specified user.

R

removeMovieListing(MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.MovieListingManager
Removes an existing cinema movie from the Movie Listing.
removeShowTime(MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.ShowTimeManager
Removes a Show Time of a Cinema Movie.
ReviewManager - Class in Controller
Contains static methods for movie-goers to add a review to a cinema movie.
ReviewManager() - Constructor for class Controller.ReviewManager
 

S

seatSelector(SeatLayout) - Static method in class Controller.BookingManager
Selects seat from a specified seat layout.
ShowTimeManager - Class in Controller
Contains static methods for Admin to add/edit/remove Show Times.
ShowTimeManager() - Constructor for class Controller.ShowTimeManager
 
sortTop5List(Top5List) - Static method in class Controller.MovieListingManager
Changes the ranking order of the Top 5 Movie Listing.
stringToDate(String) - Static method in class Controller.SystemManager
Convert date in string format dd-MMM-YYYY to date in Gregorian Calender format
SystemManager - Class in Controller
A manager class to help admin to create public holidays and change price adjustment
SystemManager() - Constructor for class Controller.SystemManager
 

U

updateMovieListing(MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.MovieListingManager
Updates the attributes of a cinema movie in the Movie Listing.
updateShowTime(CineplexList, MovieList) - Static method in class Controller.ShowTimeManager
Updates the attributes of a Show Time for a Cinema Movie.
